name: hatching-triage
label: Hatching Triage
description: A state-of-the-art malware analysis sandbox, with all the features you need. High-volume sample submission in a customizable environment with detections and configuration extraction for many malware families.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The service-based URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account for using the Hatching Triage APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.description: Submit a file or an URL for analysis based on the selected sample type and the values that you have specified.
operations.title: Submit Sample

parameters.title: Type of Sample
parameters.name: kind
parameters.tooltip: Select the submission type to perform the analysis. You can select from the following options:
parameters.description: Select the submission type to perform the analysis. You can select from the following options:

File.name: input
File.title: Type
File.description: Select from Attachment ID or File IRI.

File.name: value
File.title: Reference ID
File.description: Reference ID that is used to access the attachment metadata from FortiSOARâ„¢'s Attachments module. If you have selected Attachment ID, this defaults to the {{vars.attachment_id}} value. If you have selected File IRI, then this defaults to the {{vars.file_iri}} value.

Url.name: url
Url.title: URL
Url.tooltip: Specify the URL to submit for analysis in the URL field.
Url.description: Specify the URL to submit for analysis in the URL field.

Url.name: fetch
Url.title: Fetch the File from the URL
Url.description: Select this option to download the file before execution. If not selected, the file is executed directly from the specified URL.
Url.tooltip: Select this option to download the file before execution. If not selected, the file is executed directly from the specified URL.

parameters.title: Target
parameters.name: target
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filename of the sample. If not specified, the filename of the attached file is used.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the filename of the sample. If not specified, the filename of the attached file is used.

parameters.title: Interactive
parameters.name: interactive
parameters.tooltip: Select to choose the analysis profile manually after static analysis has finished. The default value is set to false.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select to choose the analysis profile manually after static analysis has finished. The default value is set to false.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: Specify a password to decrypt the provided file, usually an archive (zip/rar/etc).
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a password to decrypt the provided file, usually an archive (zip/rar/etc).

parameters.title: Profiles
parameters.name: profiles
parameters.tooltip: Specify a value to map one or more files to one or more profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a value to map one or more files to one or more profiles.

parameters.title: User Tags
parameters.name: user_tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify an array of user-defined strings that lets the user mark a sample. The resulting tags are embedded in the reports. The total size cannot exceed 1kB and tags cannot be empty.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an array of user-defined strings that lets the user mark a sample. The resulting tags are embedded in the reports. The total size cannot exceed 1kB and tags cannot be empty.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout duration of the analysis.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the timeout duration of the analysis.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of network routing to use.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Specify the type of network routing to use. You can choose from the following options: 

Internet
Drop
Tor

The default is Internet.

operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of samples based on the subset sample that you have specified.
operations.title: Query Samples

parameters.title: Subset
parameters.name: subset
parameters.tooltip: Select a subset to control the data included in the response based on your selection. If not specified Owned is selected by default.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select a subset to control the data included in the response based on your selection. If not specified Owned is selected by default.

operations.description: Retrieves the sample details based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Sample by ID

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID whose details to retrieve from Hatching Triage.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID whose details to retrieve from Hatching Triage.

operations.description: Retrieves a short summary of the sample and its analysis tasks based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Sample Summary

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID whose details to retrieve from Hatching Triage.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID whose details to retrieve from Hatching Triage.

operations.description: Set the sample profile to get the detailed report when a sample is in the static analysis status based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Set Sample Profile

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which to set the profile.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which to set the profile.

parameters.title: Auto
parameters.name: auto
parameters.tooltip: Select to have the system automatically select profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select to have the system automatically select profiles.

parameters.title: Pick
parameters.name: pick
parameters.tooltip: Specify the set of files to run with automatic profiles, if an archive was submitted.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the set of files to run with automatic profiles, if an archive was submitted.

parameters.title: Profiles
parameters.name: profiles
parameters.tooltip: Specify a value to map one or more files to one or more profiles.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a value to map one or more files to one or more profiles.

operations.description: Retrieves the generated static report based on the sample ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Static Report

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which to retrieve the report.

operations.description: Retrieves the generated Triage Report for a single task based on the sample and task IDs that you have provided.
operations.title: Get Triage Report

parameters.title: Sample ID
parameters.name: sample_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sample ID for which to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the sample ID for which to retrieve the report.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the task_id ID for which to retrieve the report.
parameters.description: Specify the task_id ID for which to retrieve the report.

operations.description: Creates a new profile based on the name, tags, and other input parameters that you have specified.
operations.title: Create Profile

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a unique name for the profile.
parameters.description: Specify a unique name for the profile.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify the set of tags to match this profile to samples.
parameters.description: Specify the set of tags to match this profile to samples.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout duration of the analysis in seconds.
parameters.description: Specify the timeout duration of the analysis in seconds.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample. You can choose from following options: 

Drop
Internet
Tor
Sim200
Sim404
Simnx

operations.description: Gets the detailed list of profiles.
operations.title: Get Profiles

operations.description: Updates the profile based on the profile ID, name, tags, and other input parameters specified. The stored profile is overwritten, so it is important that the submitted profile contains all fields.
operations.title: Update Profile

parameters.title: Profile ID
parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the profile ID of the profile that to update.
parameters.description: Specify the profile ID of the profile that to update.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify a unique name for the profile.
parameters.description: Specify a unique name for the profile.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.
parameters.description: Specify the set of tags that is used to match this profile to samples.

parameters.title: Timeout
parameters.name: timeout
parameters.tooltip: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.
parameters.description: Specify the timeout of the analysis in seconds.

parameters.title: Network
parameters.name: network
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Specify the type of networking that should be used when running the sample. You can choose from following options: 

Drop
Internet
Tor
Sim200
Sim404
Simnx

operations.description: Deletes a profile based on the profile ID that you have specified.
operations.title: Delete Profile

parameters.title: Profile ID
parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the profile to delete.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the profile to delete.

operations.description: Searches all available analyses for a range of IoCs or file characteristics based on the search query that you have specified. The Search API endpoint supports all filters and queries which can be used through the web interface.
operations.title: Search By Query

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the query to fetch the analysis records.
parameters.description: Specify the query to fetch the analysis records. Refer this link for more information about Hatching Triage queries: https://tria.ge/docs/cloud-api/search/
